pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Network Models for Dynamic Network Data // Tools for fitting statistical network models to dynamic network data. Can be used for fitting both dynamic network actor models ('DyNAMs') and relational event models ('REMs'). Stadtfeld, Hollway, and Block (2017a) doi:10.1177/0081175017709295, Stadtfeld, Hollway, and Block (2017b) doi:10.1177/0081175017733457, Stadtfeld and Block (2017) doi:10.15195/v4.a14, Hoffman et al. (2020) doi:10.1017/nws.2020.3.
